Episodes.Title: I'm Leslie Knope
Episodes.Plot: Leslie is torn between Ben and her dreams of running for public office, while Ron braces himself for the arrival of his first wife, the original Tammy.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Patricia Clarkson, Kirk Fox, Johnny Sneed

Episodes.Title: Ron and Tammys
Episodes.Plot: Ron's first ex-wife, Tammy One, reenters his life and tries to control his every move. Meanwhile, Ben helps Tom balance the books at his new company, and Ann makes a PSA, with help from Chris.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Megan Mullally, Patricia Clarkson, Ben Schwartz, Paula Pell, Detlef Schrempf

Episodes.Title: Born and Raised
Episodes.Plot: Leslie's book about Pawnee comes out just in time for her campaign. Ann tries to bond with Ron and April.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Pamela Reed, Dan Castellaneta, Mo Collins, Johnny Sneed

Episodes.Title: Pawnee Rangers
Episodes.Plot: Ron takes his boys-only troop of Pawnee Rangers into the wild. Not wanting the girls to feel left out, Leslie also takes her troop of Pawnee Goddesses on an adventure weekend. Meanwhile, a reluctant Ben joins Tom and Donna for a day of relaxation, and Chris spends some time with Jerry.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Meet 'n' Greet
Episodes.Plot: Andy and April host a Halloween bash at their house. Tom emcees an event for Leslie's campaign. Andy and April receive an unusual wedding present from Ron and Ann.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: End of the World
Episodes.Plot: A local Pawnee group predicts the end of days, causing chaos in the Parks department.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Ben Schwartz, Natalie Morales, Robert Pine, Alison Becker, Roy Hibbert

Episodes.Title: The Treaty
Episodes.Plot: Leslie enlists the help of Ben, Andy and April to host a Model U.N. for Pawnee Central High School. Chris asks Ann for her advice on love when a date cancels on him. Meanwhile, Ron struggles to find a replacement for Tom.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Smallest Park
Episodes.Plot: Leslie uses her new tourist attraction as a way to spend more time with Ben. Meanwhile, Ron  and April encourage Andy to go to college, and Chris tasks Tom and Jerry with revamping the Parks and Rec logo.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: The Trial of Leslie Knope
Episodes.Plot: Leslie has to face an ethics committee about her secret relationship with Ben after they come clean to Chris.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Citizen Knope
Episodes.Plot: Unable to get work done from inside the Parks Department, Leslie forms a citizen action group and fights from the outside. Meanwhile, everyone in the office brainstorms ideas for what to get Leslie for Christmas.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Ben Schwartz, Jason Mantzoukas, Johnny Sneed

Episodes.Title: The Comeback Kid
Episodes.Plot: Leslie enlists everyone's help in staging an attention-getting event. Ben takes up a new hobby, while April and Andy adopt a pet.
Episodes.GuestStars: Tuc Watkins, Johnny Sneed, Boo Arnold, Antonia Raftu

Episodes.Title: Campaign Ad
Episodes.Plot: Faced with a tough new opponent, Leslie and Ben disagree on the content of her first campaign ad. Ron is very uncomfortable when Chris tries to befriend him, while Andy and April make a trip to the doctor.

Episodes.Title: Bowling for Votes
Episodes.Plot: Leslie and Ben host a bowling night after receiving feedback about Leslie's campaign. April, Chris, and Jerry hold a competition to see who can raise the most funds.

Episodes.Title: Operation Ann
Episodes.Plot: Leslie works to find Ann a Valentine's date. Ron helps Ben with a scavenger hunt, and Chris becomes depressed over his love life.

Episodes.Title: Dave Returns
Episodes.Plot: While trying to get an endorsement from the Chief of Police, Leslie and Ben awkwardly run into Leslie's old flame, Dave. Meanwhile, Andy and the rest of the office work on a theme song for Leslie's campaign.

Episodes.Title: Sweet Sixteen
Episodes.Plot: Leslie realizes that the department has forgotten Jerry's birthday and decides to throw a party for him at a special location. Meanwhile, Tom is flabbergasted when he finds out Ann doesn't share his taste in music.

Episodes.Title: Campaign Shake-Up
Episodes.Plot: Leslie and Ben are caught off guard when her opponent Bobby Newport hires a powerful campaign manager from Washington. Chris forces Ron to start interviewing replacements for Leslie when work starts falling through the cracks, and an unlikely officemate solves a challenging problem.

Episodes.Title: Lucky
Episodes.Plot: Leslie and Ben are thrilled when Buddy Wood wants to interview Leslie for his Indianapolis talkshow. April and Ron prep Andy for his final exam in his Women?s Studies course.

Episodes.Title: Live Ammo
Episodes.Plot: Leslie discovers that the Parks Department budget is about to be cut, and she later meets the City Council member she is running to replace. Chris and Ron visit a meditation center.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kathryn Hahn, Bradley Whitford, Chelsea Peretti

Episodes.Title: The Debate
Episodes.Plot: Leslie goes toe-to-toe with Bobby Newport in a debate. Ann, Tom, and Chris work in the media spin room, while Ron goes the extra mile to save a party for Leslie's donors.
Episodes.GuestStars: Paul Rudd, Kathryn Hahn, Mo Collins, Mara Marini

Episodes.Title: Bus Tour
Episodes.Plot: An important person in Pawnee dies while Leslie is on a bus tour for the final day of her campaign. Meanwhile Andy investigates a security threat, and Chris finds a cure for his depression.
Episodes.GuestStars: Paul Rudd, Kathryn Hahn, Mike O'Malley, Kirk Fox, Jay Jackson, Leonard Robinson, Brenda Canela, Danielle Kennedy, James M. Connor, Avery Phillips, Lukas Martin, Nicole Alexandra Shipley

Episodes.Title: Win, Lose, or Draw
Episodes.Plot: It's election day in Pawnee, and Leslie and Bobby Newport are separated by a razor-thin margin. While everyone waits with Leslie for the race to be called, they ponder their futures, and their new opportunities.
Episodes.GuestStars: Paul Rudd, Kathryn Hahn, Ben Schwartz
